revtext: Got hair extensions last year. Quality is very good. I thank ayisha for heping me to select the type of closures and extensions i need. Well done.great job.
revreply: Thanks so much for your comments. We are so happy to note that you got the right product that suited you best. Our extensions are made from the finest quality of Remy Human Hair and if the aftercare is as advised these last you a long long time. Our team will be thrilled to note your comments.
